title: 'Total failure': SC slams 'ad-hoc' measures for toxic Delhi air; directs to close 9 toll plazas
content: The Supreme Court is pushing for practical solutions to Delhi's severe air pollution crisis. It has directed the Delhi government to directly transfer funds to verified idle construction workers and consider providing them alternative work. The court also criticized the affluent for violating pollution norms, highlighting the disproportionate impact on the poor.

title: Big boost: Army receives final batch of 3 Apache AH-64E attack helicopters - see pics
content: India's Army Aviation Corps has received the final three AH-64E Apache attack helicopters, completing its contracted fleet. These advanced aircraft, set to be based in Jodhpur, significantly boost the Army's attack and reconnaissance capabilities. This delivery marks a key milestone in the growing US-India defence partnership, enhancing regional security cooperation.

title: 'Thank you for giving me new life': Sarfaraz Khan shares emotional note after CSK pick
content: Chennai Super Kings secured Sarfaraz Khan at his base price of Rs 75 lakh, a move fueled by his recent explosive Syed Mushtaq Ali Trophy performance.  The franchise also made significant investments in uncapped talents Kartik Sharma and Prashant Veer, alongside acquiring Matt Henry and Rahul Chahar.  This strategic recruitment follows a major trade that saw Sanju Samson join CSK.

title: Bad news for phone buyers: Higher prices, fewer features in 2026; here‚Äôs the reason why
content: Get ready for pricier smartphones in 2026! A global memory chip shortage, fueled by AI data center demand, is driving up manufacturing costs. Expect average prices to jump nearly 7% year-over-year, with budget phones hit hardest. Shipments are projected to decline, as companies grapple with rising expenses and potential component downgrades.

title: Goa nightclub blaze probe: One of Luthra brothers complains of chest pain, taken to hospital
content: Co-owners of the nightclub where a deadly fire claimed 25 lives, Saurabh and Gaurav Luthra, experienced a medical emergency upon their return to Goa for the probe. One sibling complained of chest pain and uneasiness shortly after landing, hours after their deportation from Thailand and arrest in Delhi.

title: Highest rating by an Indian! Varun creates history; tightens grip on No.1 T20I ranking
content: Mystery spinner Varun Chakaravarthy has reached a career-best rating, solidifying his No.1 spot in ICC T20I bowler rankings. His exceptional performance against South Africa, including crucial wickets, bolsters India's T20 World Cup defence hopes.  Pacer Arshdeep Singh and batter Tilak Varma also saw significant rankings improvements, adding to India's growing optimism.

title: Amazon layoffs: Biggest ever job cuts in Europe; these roles are impacted the most
content: Amazon is cutting 370 jobs, or 8.5%, at its European headquarters in Luxembourg, impacting software developers most due to AI advancements. This is company's biggest ever job cuts in the Europe, following global layoffs back in October and a negotiated social plan. Despite the reduction, Luxembourg remains a strategic European hub for Amazon, which continues to hire in key areas.

title: Message to Trump? Sitharaman says 'trade getting weaponised through tariffs'
content: Finance minister Nirmala Sitharaman highlighted that global trade is increasingly being weaponized through tariffs and other measures. She warned India must negotiate carefully in this evolving landscape, where trade is no longer free and fair. Sitharaman emphasised that India's actions aim to protect domestic industries from unfair competition and predatory practices.

title: Delhi pollution: China shares tips for India; adds 'challenge remains complex'
content: As Delhi grapples with severe air pollution, the Chinese Embassy in India shared its nation's strategies for tackling the issue. China implemented ultra-strict vehicle emission controls, including phasing out old vehicles and promoting electric mobility. The country also undertook industrial restructuring, shutting down heavy industries and transforming former factory sites into public spaces and economic hubs.

title: No quick fix: Delhi govt announces strict restrictions as AQI soars; 50% WFH mandatory
content: Delhi faces severe air pollution, prompting the government to implement Stage-IV GRAP restrictions. Measures include 50% work from home, mandatory PUC certificates for fuel, and a ban on construction material trucks. Officials acknowledge the long-standing nature of the pollution crisis and the need for sustained efforts.

title: Croma December sale: iPhone 16 at Rs 40,990 and other year-end deals
content: Croma's 'Cromtastic December Sale' is offering significant discounts on electronics from December 15, 2025, to January 4, 2026. Shoppers can find deals on smartphones like the iPhone 16 and Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7, alongside laptops, TVs, and washing machines.

title: Royal farewell: Ethiopian PM drives PM Modi to airport in rare gesture; see pics
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi received a rare personal diplomatic honour in Ethiopia as Prime Minister Abiy Ahmed Ali personally drove him to the airport. The visit saw the elevation of India-Ethiopia ties to a Strategic Partnership and PM Modi being conferred Ethiopia's highest civilian honour, highlighting growing Indian diplomatic stature.

title: Exclusive | More than politician Pappu Yadav's son: Sarthak Ranjan‚Äôs battle, breakdown and breakthrough
content: Overshadowed by his parents‚Äô towering political identities, Sarthak Ranjan fought prejudice, self-doubt and mental battles to keep his cricketing dream alive. A revival through the Delhi Premier League and a Rs 30 lakh IPL deal with KKR now mark the first real step in his quest to be known for his talent ‚Äî not his surname.

title: Inside Connor McDavid‚Äôs luxury car collection: supercars, favorites, and what makes it unique
content: Hockey superstar Connor McDavid's impressive car collection mirrors his on-ice prowess. Featuring a diverse range from the roaring Lamborghini Hurac√°n and precise Audi R8 to the luxurious Range Rover Vogue and powerful Chevrolet Camaro ZL1, his fleet showcases speed, precision, and personality. The Porsche 911 GT2 RS stands out as his favorite, embodying his passion for high-performance engineering.

title: Ayesha Curry admits she never expected to fall for NBA legend Stephen Curry
content: Stephen and Ayesha Curry's love story began in childhood at church, though they didn't start dating until their teenage years. Ayesha's unwavering support, even encouraging Stephen to finish his degree before the NBA draft, solidified his decision to marry her. Their enduring marriage has weathered public scrutiny, with Stephen consistently crediting his wife.

title: Sherrone Moore‚Äôs wife Kelli decides future amid alleged Paige Shiver affair
content: Sherrone Moore and Paige Shiver's alleged affair drama sparked chaos among fans but it seems now his wife, Kelli Moore, has stepped into the drama, days after he was released from police custody. While Sherrone Moore faces serious accusations, Kelli Moore might have made a decision about her marriage and future.

title: NBA injury update: Wembanyama to play as Spurs face Knicks in NBA Cup final
content: The NBA Cup final features the Spurs against the Knicks in Las Vegas. Victor Wembanyama is back for the Spurs after an injury, ready to play any role needed.  Despite his eagerness to start, the team is carefully managing his minutes.  The Knicks will have their full starting lineup for this high-stakes championship game.

title: UAE introduces amendments to corporate tax, VAT, and company laws
content: The UAE has introduced amendments to its corporate tax, VAT, and Commercial Companies Law to improve regulatory clarity and business efficiency. The changes outline how corporate tax credits and incentives are applied, simplify VAT procedures, and introduce greater flexibility in company structures, including new non-profit entities and enhanced capital arrangements.

title: Trump‚Äôs H-1B visa crackdown: Why $100,000 fee will hit companies like TCS, Infosys ‚Äî explained
content: US President Trump's proposed $100,000 H-1B visa fee will significantly impact Indian IT giants like TCS and Infosys. This substantial levy, aimed at curbing foreign worker reliance, could cost these firms hundreds of millions. Analysts anticipate a shift towards offshore recruitment and reduced visa applications as companies adapt.

title: 'Dhurandhar' box office collection day 13 (LIVE): Movie inches towards Rs 420 crore in India
content: Ranveer Singh's 'Dhurandhar' is shattering box office records, becoming his highest earner ever and surpassing 'Padmaavat'. The film has achieved unprecedented numbers, including a massive opening weekend and week, and setting new benchmarks for an A-rated Hindi film. Its second week collections are proving historic, demonstrating incredible audience reception.

title: Rob Reiner & Michelle‚Äôs murder: What happened at Christmas party? Watch Nick Reiner surrender
content: A Hollywood Christmas party argument reportedly preceded a horrific family tragedy. Director Rob Reiner's son, Nick, allegedly murdered his parents after a volatile dispute, fueled by fears of his spiraling mental health and drug relapse.  Nick, who has a history of addiction and violent outbursts, was arrested and charged with their murders.

title: 5 govt jobs closing today with over 2,900 vacancies: Check eligibility & where to apply
content: Government job aspirants have a final chance today, December 17, 2025, to apply for over 2,900 positions. Major recruitment drives for Junior Engineers in Andaman and Nicobar, Nursing Officers in Uttarakhand, Act Apprentices in South Eastern Railway, specialists at AIIMS, and Medical Laboratory Technicians are closing. Interested candidates must check eligibility and apply through official websites before the deadline.

title: Are Sherrone Moore and wife Kelli headed for divorce amid Paige Shiver return
content: Sherrone Moore‚Äôs arrest and firing have sparked speculation about the future of his marriage to wife Kelli, despite the couple being seen together outside his lawyer‚Äôs office. Allegations of an inappropriate relationship, resurfacing Paige Shiver rumors, and disturbing court claims have intensified public scrutiny, raising questions about whether their decade-long marriage can survive the legal and emotional fallout.

title: 'Kept on begging for help': Bengaluru man dies of heart attack on road; wife donates his eyes
content: A 34-year-old mechanic died after a scooter fall while being rushed to the hospital following a heart attack. His wife alleges that a private hospital's delay in treatment and the apathy of passing motorists contributed to his death. She is demanding action against the hospital and urging for greater public compassion.

title: 'Fully defeated on Day 1‚Äô: Congress‚Äôs Chavan refuses to apologise for Op Sindoor remark; BJP hits back
content: Congress leader Prithviraj Chavan refused to apologize for his remarks on Operation Sindoor, asserting his constitutional right to question military operations. He claimed India was "completely defeated" on the first day, with Indian aircraft shot down and the Air Force grounded. BJP leaders criticized Chavan's statements as an insult to the armed forces.

title: iPhone chips to be made in India? Apple in talks with manufacturers; why it's significant
content: Apple is reportedly in early talks with Indian chip manufacturers, specifically CG Semi, for assembling and packaging iPhone components. This potential collaboration, focusing initially on display chips, marks a significant step for India's burgeoning semiconductor sector. Meeting Apple's stringent quality demands will be crucial for CG Semi's success.

title: UAE weather update: Rain and gusty winds expected today
content: The UAE is set to experience rain and gusty winds today. Cloudy skies will cover parts of the country, with temperatures dipping slightly. The National Centre of Meteorology has issued warnings for areas with strong southeasterly winds, which may lift dust and sand. Residents are advised to stay alert and follow safety guidance as the weather develops.

title: Why you should not take your phone to the toilet, Harvard doctor explains
content: Doctors are warning that taking phones to the toilet increases hemorrhoid risk due to prolonged sitting and pressure on sensitive tissues. Apps designed to hold attention make users lose track of time, leading to extended visits that negatively affect rectal health. Limiting toilet time to under five minutes is recommended to protect long-term well-being.

title: Dhoni's last dance? Ex-India batter reads the signs as CSK bet big on youth at IPL Auction
content: Robin Uthappa predicts MS Dhoni's final IPL season will be in 2026. Chennai Super Kings' focus on young players signals Dhoni's move to a mentor role. The franchise is investing heavily in new talent. This strategy points to a succession plan for the team. Dhoni will likely transition from player to mentor.

title: Bomb scare: 3 Ahmedabad schools receive threat emails; security tightened
content: Three Ahmedabad schools received bomb threat emails on Wednesday, prompting immediate police intervention and deployment to ensure student and staff safety. The threatening messages, reportedly linked to Khalistan sympathizers, led to the evacuation of students as authorities conducted thorough inspections. This incident follows similar hoax threats reported in schools in Amritsar and Delhi.

title: 250 km/h on 80 km/h limit: Lamborghini seized in Mumbai after video goes viral; watch
content: Worli police have seized a Lamborghini after a video surfaced online showing it exceeding 200 km/h on the Bandra Worli Sea Link, where the speed limit is 80 km/h. The vehicle was identified via its registration number in the viral footage. Authorities are currently verifying the documents of the car's owner and dealer.

title: Trouble for Shilpa, Raj Kundra: Star couple faces additional charge of cheating in Rs 60cr - details
content: Mumbai Police's Economic Offences Wing has escalated charges against Shilpa Shetty Kundra and Raj Kundra to cheating under Section 420 of the IPC. This follows new evidence in a Rs 60.48 crore loan-cum-investment deal dispute involving their former company, Best Deal TV. The couple had previously challenged the FIR, deeming it a civil matter.

title: ‚ÄòNo doctor at 1st hospital, no ambulance at 2nd': Wife takes dying husband on bike; crashes en route
content: A mechanic's desperate search for emergency healthcare turned tragic after two hospitals refused treatment and a subsequent accident left him injured. Despite pleas for help, many vehicles passed by before a cab driver intervened, but it was too late. The man died, leaving behind his young children and mother.

title: From digital to paper: Can pen-and-paper exams end NTA‚Äôs test turmoil?
content: The parliamentary standing committee on education has recommended a stronger focus on pen-and-paper exams for major national tests such as JEE, NEET and CUET, citing repeated disruptions in computer-based testing by the NTA. The report highlighted issues with private vendors, financial management, and security risks, while noting the reliability of CBSE and UPSC systems. Proposed reforms also include aligning school curricula, limiting coaching hours, and exploring hybrid assessment models to reduce dependence on private coaching and enhance exam integrity.

title: 'One eye found protruding': How UP man secretly plotted triple murder; dug 9-ft pit, bought pistol
content: A man confessed to a brutal triple murder, shooting and strangling his wife and two daughters after she refused to wear a hijab. He then buried their bodies in his courtyard. The motive stemmed from a long-standing dispute over his wife's attire, escalating into a meticulously planned act of violence. The couple's other children slept through the horrific events.

title: Amid Dhurandhar success, Akshaye performs Vastu Shanti
content: Even as Dhurandhar continues its thunderous box office run, Akshaye Khanna has quietly stepped away from the spotlight. While audiences and social media are raving about his portrayal of Rehman Dakait ‚Äî especially his striking presence in the viral track FA9LA ‚Äî the actor is reportedly spending time in seclusion at his Alibaug residence. With no personal social media presence, fans were surprised when a rare video of the actor surfaced online.

title: Watch: Dhols, dances & tears of joy ‚Äî Baramulla erupts after Auqib Nabi's IPL deal
content: Baramulla erupted in joy as local cricketer Auqib Nabi Dar secured an Rs 8.40 crore IPL deal with Delhi Capitals. Celebrations filled the streets outside his home, with locals beating drums and dancing. His father expressed immense pride, attributing the success to hard work and dedication. This breakthrough marks a significant moment for Jammu and Kashmir cricket.

title: Saudi Arabia hit by 4.3-magnitude earthquake, region records fourth tremor in 2025
content: A moderate 4.3-magnitude earthquake struck Saudi Arabia's Eastern Province early Wednesday, December 17, 2025. The tremor, recorded at a depth of 50 kilometers, caused no reported injuries or damage. This event is the fourth notable seismic occurrence in the region this year, highlighting ongoing tectonic activity.

title: SMAT: Health scare for Yashasvi Jaiswal - India opener hospitalised in Pune
content: Young Indian opener Yashasvi Jaiswal was hospitalised with acute gastroenteritis after playing for Mumbai in a Syed Mushtaq Ali Trophy match. Despite experiencing stomach cramps during the game, he contributed to Mumbai's chase. Doctors have advised rest and medication. This setback comes as Jaiswal has been in excellent form across formats.

title: From Delhi to Bangkok and back: Luthra brothers brought to Goa; how their 'empire' went up in smoke
content: Brothers Saurabh and Gaurav Luthra, owners of a Goa nightclub where a deadly fire killed 25, were deported from Thailand and arrested in Delhi. They have now been brought back to Goa by police custody, marking a dramatic end to an international chase. Investigators aim to uncover details about the fire and alleged safety violations.

title: Loan nightmare: Farmer forced to sell kidney in Cambodia as Rs 1 lakh debt soars to Rs 74L; 6 held
content: A Chandrapur farmer, driven to desperation by exorbitant interest rates and harassment from six private moneylenders, has filed a police complaint.  Forced into a debt trap that spiralled from Rs 1 lakh to Rs 74 lakh, he resorted to selling his kidney in Cambodia for Rs 8 lakh to settle his dues. Police have arrested the accused.

title: Sean McVay, Rams announce birth of son, Christian Alexander McVay
content: new: "what a crazy week to be playing on a Thursday," coach says . new: he says he's "a blessing to be able to play in meaningful games" new: his wife, veronika, welcomed a baby boy named Christian Alexander McVay . the baby boy was born the day after the Rams clinched a playoff berth .

title: College football bowl season: MVPs for the first two bowl games of the season
content: south Carolina State beat Prairie View A&M 40‚Äì38 with a two-point conversion and stop in quadruple overtime . it's one of the most exciting times of the year as the 2025 bowl season is underway! make your picks Our college football experts provide their MVP picks for each of the 36 bowl games this season .

title: Best fits for transfer quarterback DJ Lagway: Five schools that make the most sense
content: DJ Lagway is the top-rated quarterback in the 2024 ESPN 300 . he's coming off a 4-8 season in which he threw 14 interceptions and ranked 14th in the conference in QBR (59.5) but there's still a market for his talents if the 19-game starter can find the right situation and stay healthy .

title: Ranking all 64 teams in College Football Playoff history
content: the new era of college football features a larger College Football Playoff and a lower bar for inclusion . the transfer portal and increased freedom of movement for players have meant that today's best teams can't stockpile awesome backups as easily as they could in the past .

content: the 2025-26 season offers plenty of teams who fit that description . eight teams entered the season with relatively high playoff odds . they now find themselves most on the wrong side of the postseason bubble . we'll also identify the othelo .

title: Latest AP poll: What's next for every Top 25 team?
content: the sixth in-season edition of the men's AP Top 25 poll features little movement . Arizona retains its No. 1 position, with no changes in the top 10 other than Gonzaga and Houston swapping the no. 7 and 8 spots . only one new team cracks this week's top 25 .

title: Takeaways, highlights as Knicks defeat Spurs to win 2025 NBA Cup
content: the new York Knicks beat the San Antonio Spurs 124-113 in the fourth quarter . the knicks are 2025 Emirates NBA Cup champions after beating the Spurs 35-19 . OG Anunoby had a team-high 28 points for new york, guard Jalen Brunson added 25 points .
